description:
%%% INTRODUCTION SALE PRICE %%%

Update: Users can now select any year for their logs


Now for both the TouchPad and Pre 3!

For the people who like to get the most out of their workouts, Workout Log is the perfect fit.
User friendly & easy to use. Keeping track of your workouts has never been easier.  

At a glance you have the ability to view all your different workouts, when they were performed, exercises, as well as the number of sets performed.

With each set you can enter weight, reps and your rest period. Enter as much information as you would like or as little you can always edit the information later using the edit buttons. Workout Log is completely flexible.

Most recent workouts are always at the top making it easy to check how you recently performed and exercises display in the order they were entered, making Workout Log great for keeping track of exercise programs where order is important.

No longer need a to keep track of a workout, or made a mistake? Easily swipe any workout, log, or exercise to the left to delete it. It is that intuitive and simple.

Each workout is also backed up to your Palm Profile in the event that your device is lost or destroyed. Ensuring all your workout data will be restored upon obtaining a new device and reinstalling the app.


Also please rate the app and left others know what you think. 

Please feel free to contact me if you find any issues or would like any new features added or for any other reason. your input is always welcome.

****Coming Soon****

- Ability to enter cardio exercises (ex. treadmill, biking) including duration, distance, and speed
- Ability to enter notes for each set
- Support for timed exercises (ex. Planks) replacing reps with hold time
 
  and more.....
